text: School Announcement
Motion
─Mano, are you here...!?

Hiori-chan...
are you okay...?
Found you!!
Meguru-chan...!

Aha-ha-ha, it's been ages since we met here!
Don't think you'll get away unscathed!

...Let's escape for now.
Let's blend into the crowd and wait it out...
Huh, huh...?

────That's why I couldn't help you...
I'm sorry, Mano...

Mano...!?
What's wrong!?

...Well, I found a notice just now that said
"Please be quiet in the hallway"...

"Mission clear!
From now on, we will distribute balloon art as a gift-"

--And here's the new clear reward,
an item card. Here you go!

Wow, really...?
Thank you so much...

You're amazing, Mano!
Now we get items for clearing missions.
Maybe with this, we can get Meguru back!

!
Th-this item card...!

It might not be that exact card,
but it probably means there's an item like that.
Then, if we find that item...

Good job, everyone!
Let's take a break for now!
